Class FileDownload

  • java.lang.Object
    • local.FileDownload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<FileFtpOperationFuture>

    public class FileDownload
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<FileFtpOperationFuture>
    Class provides support for downloading files over ftp.
    Author:
    Ivan Straka
    See Also:
    FileFtpOperationFuture
